title: Golden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Was originally a vegetarian restaurant but has added chicken and fish along with a full line of soy and gluten tacos, milanesas, enchiladas, tortas, various salads (menu is on the website). This is the original location, a 15-minute walk from the center. Large, typical neighborhood comedor setup frequented almost exclusively by locals. Many options for vegans, but limited (or no) English.
streetAddress: Molino del Rey 226, at Las Campanas
